title: Working elephants of Siam
brief_description: Provides a study of the teak industry in the tropical uplands of Thailand. Shows elephants hauling and lifting the teak logs in the forests and swimming in the river in the evening.
description: Provides a study of the teak industry in the tropical uplands of Thailand. Shows elephants hauling and lifting the teak logs in the forests and swimming in the river in the evening.
